text: he eemaan vaalo! nyaay ke saath khade rahakar allaah ke lie saakshee (gavaah) ban jao. yadyapi saakshy (gavaahee) tumhaare apane athava maata pita aur sameepavartiyon ke virudhd ho, yadi koee dhanee athava nirdhan ho, to allaah tumase adhik un donon ka hitaishee hai. atah apanee manokaanksha ke lie nyaay se na phiro. yadi tum baat ghuma phira kar karoge athava saakshy dene se kataraoge, to nihsandeh allaah usase soochit hai, jo tum karate ho
